title: How does one get a "S"?
body: I have seen far too many players get a S with scores that aren't that great.  10/11/5 not top dmg, not top CS, and when i get similar scores or even way better scores i get an A at best.  So i was wondering, how does one acquire an S? ( recnt game 10/2/10 as Malphite with 2nd best DMG and top CS on team.)

replies.body: It's based off the score avg. for your champ in your lane. So it will be more easy to say get an S with urgot jungle then with say vayne adc.
Your role and champion set the metric, your performance determines your grade. KDA, CS, objectives taken, warding, and so on; all of those have an affect on how you're scored.

Kill/Death/Assist (KDA) is a part of what players do in-game, and so it's useful to understand your performance on those measures. Here is a link that shows the various champions and their average KDAs over the past month:
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats

Work towards achieving the expected KDA for your favorite champ/role. When you can consistently do that, it's time to start thinking about other measures of performance.

http://s32.postimg.org/bvr96ir51/patch_6_8.jpg

Ended up getting an S today on Veigar Support. About 7/1/12 because I was busy warding and keeping the enemy on lockdown with my E.

Sometimes crazy stuff works best.

Also pink wards. Placing pink wards is a score booster if you do it at least twice or thrice.
